```{r}
# load in relevant functions & packages 
source("../../utils/classification_plot.R")
library("tidyverse")

# set the default ggplot theme 
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

```{r}
# read in the data 
df <- read.csv('../../../data/fascicle_classification.csv')
```

```{r}
# make the plot 
df %>% 
  classification_plot()

# save to figures folder
ggsave(filename = 
           paste0("fig4.png"),
        width = 4,
         height = 4)
```
